1: <pb/>Ayic ix lajviec' juntzan̈ chi', ix scatab'an vin̈aj Job chi' jun c'u b'aj aljinac. Ix yalan vin̈ icha tic:
3: <pb/><t>Tzin catab'ej jun ac'val ayic scuchannac in och ix in nun. Tzin catab'ej jun c'u ayic valjinac.</t>
4: <t>Comonoc a jun c'u chi' och d'ac'valilal. Comonoc cann̈ej icha chi' yuj Dios, maj sacb'oc.</t>
5: <t>Comonoc ay val junoc nivan veven ochnac, yic vach' q'uic'b'icaneli. Comonoc ay val junoc nivan q'uic' asun musani, ma junoc q'uic' och d'a sat c'u, yic ay xivc'olal d'a jun c'u chi'.</t>
6: <t>Comonoc q'uic'alq'uinal ajcan jun ac'val chi', yic vach' maj och jun c'u chi' sb'isuloc sc'ual yic jun uj chi' yed' jun ab'il chi'.</t>
7: <t>Comonoc malaj tas uji d'a jun ac'val chi', yic vach' malaj av yic tzalajc'olal ochi.</t>
8: <t>Comonoc scatab'aj jun ac'val chi' yuj eb' ajb'aal, aton eb' syal scuchb'an noc' leviatán.</t>
9: <t>Comonoc maj q'ueul q'uen nivac c'anal d'a jun q'uin̈ib'alil chi'. Comonoc maj q'ueul saquilq'uinal stan̈vaj sq'ueuli yed' saquil yich chaan̈.</t>
10: <t>Tzin catab'ej jun ac'val chi', yujto maj syamoch vaan valjub'al. Tato maay, tecan max vil jantac yaelal yed' cusc'olal tic.</t>
11: <t>Octom cham in d'a yol sc'ol ix in nun. Octom cham in ayic van valji.</t>
12: <t>Octom malaj jolom penec chaan in. Octom malaj im in chu'u yic tzin q'uib'i.</t>
13: <t>Octom chamnac in, tzalajc'olal am tzin vay ticnaic. Junc'olal am svic' vip</t>
14: <t>yed' eb' rey yed' eb' yajal, aton eb' ix b'oanxiq'ue juntzan̈ nivac pat emnac lan̈najoc,</t>
15: <t>ma yed' eb' nivac yajal b'ud'an spalacio yuj q'uen oro yed' q'uen plata.</t>
16: <t>¿Tas yuj maj in mucchaj icha junoc unin ton̈ej tz'eq'ui, ma icha junoc unin chamnacxo tz'alji?</t>
17: <t>A b'aj smucchaj eb' chamnac, ata' slajvican b'aj syixtej anima eb' chuc. A pax ta' syic' yip eb' tz'ixtaj yuj eb' chi'.</t>
18: <t>Ata' syic' yip eb' icha preso yaj d'a munlajel, man̈xa b'aj syab' eb' stumaj yuj eb' tz'ilan munlajel chi'.</t>
19: <t>Ata' ayec' eb' nivac yelc'ochi yed' eb' malaj yelc'ochi yed' eb' elnacxo d'a yalan̈ smandar spatrón. Lajanxon̈ej eb' smasanil.</t>
20: <t>¿Tas yuj syac' Dios saquilq'uinal yil eb' tz'ixtaji? ¿Tas yuj syac' sq'uinal eb' ayoch d'a syaelal,</t>
21: <t>eb' snib'ej cham sb'a, palta max chamlaj eb', vach'chom snib'ej chamel chi' eb' d'a yichan̈ b'eyumal?</t>
22: <t>A jun anima chi' schax stzalajc'olal yuuj ayic toxo ix b'atcan d'a yol b'aj smucchaji.</t>
23: <t>¿Tas yuj an̈eja' yac'an in q'uinal Dios, a in to man̈ vojtacoc tas ol in ajoc, a in icha val to macan in yuuj?</t>
24: <t>Maxtzac yal in va'i, maxtzac yal pax vuc'an a' yuj oq'uel yuj in yaelal.</t>
25: <t>A tas b'aj svecxiv in b'a, aton sjavi d'a vib'an̈.</t>
26: <t>Maxtzac yal vic'an jab'oc vip, man̈xalaj svach'il vaji. Man̈xa jab'oc in junc'olal, axon̈ej yaelal tzin ic'ani, xchi vin̈aj Job chi'.</t>
